documents.title: Album cover design
documents.description:
Between 2014 and 2017, I worked as a freelancer on fiverr.com, creating album covers for independent artists. I was commissioned to create over 200 album covers for independent artists, with an average satisfaction rating of 4.9/5 (136 reviews).

Because these were generally made for a very low cost (Â£5), I had to be very creative in my use of typography and stock images, using very little elements to create unique and interesting covers which would accurately reflect the song(s) they were designed for.

contentblocks.title: "Neffex - Nine2Five"
contentblocks.description:
This EP cover was designed for a band called Neffex around 2016. They who now have over a billion views on [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/neffexmusic), and hundreds of millions of streams on [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/3z97WMRi731dCvKklIf2X6?si=DAlYsT8dTouQ3iqIHXyg9Q).

The creative brief described the music itself as providing inspiration to focus on self-goals and accomplishment, without forgetting to "have fun and enjoy the ride, without taking life too seriously".
